entity.name: Nishant Mishra
entity.description:
I am a student and I have been doing FOSS development and contributing to open source since I was 14. I'm currently doing a CS degree and do FOSS development as a hobby. I have a deep interest in developing Android apps and I write open source code as a way to give back to the open source world what it has given to me all along my programming journey. And also because I love writing code ;)

I would really appreciate any financial support from the open source community.

projects.name: WikiReader
projects.description: Android app for reading Wikipedia pages distraction-free, with a Material 3 Expressive UI

projects.name: Tomato
projects.description: Minimalist Pomodoro timer for Android based on Material 3 Expressive

channels.description: Will accept direct bank transfers. Please e-mail me for details.
Will accept transfers via UPI (for people in India). Please e-mail me for details.
GitHub Sponsors page. Donors will be listed publicly and a GitHub account is required.
Buy Me A Coffee page. No account is required, allows anonymous donations.

plans.name: $1 per month
plans.description:
- Show support for my work ❤️
- Get your name in further update changelogs (ignored for anonymous donations)

plans.name: $5 per month
plans.description:
- Get your profile picture in further update changelogs (ignored for anonymous donations)
- Get the ability to prioritize one (1) planned feature or suggest a new one

plans.name: $10 per month
plans.description:
- Get your name and profile picture in further update changelogs (ignored for anonymous donations)
- Get your profile picture in the repository README (ignored for anonymous donations)
- Get the ability to prioritize two (2) planned features or suggest new ones

plans.name: $15 per month
plans.description:
- Get your name and profile picture in further update changelogs (ignored for anonymous donations)
- Get your name and profile picture in the repository README (ignored for anonymous donations)
- Get the ability to prioritize four (4) planned features or suggest new ones

plans.name: $1 one-time
plans.description:
- Show support for my work ❤️
- Get your name in the next update changelog (ignored for anonymous donations)

plans.name: $5 one-time
plans.description: - Get your profile picture in the next update changelog (ignored for anonymous donations)

plans.name: $10 one-time
plans.description: Get your name and profile picture in the next update changelog (ignored for anonymous donations)

plans.name: $15 one-time
plans.description: Get your name and profile picture in the next update release, and your name mentioned in the README (ignored for anonymous donations)

plans.name: Any amount (monthly)
plans.description: Get the rewards corresponding to the highest monthly tier not exceeding the donation amount

plans.name: Any amount (one-time)
plans.description: Get the rewards corresponding to the highest one-time tier not exceeding the donation amount
